description:
The domain bearmarketcoin.vip is impersonating the legitimate crypto project Bear Market Coin by using an identical/confusingly similar name and narrative to mislead users.
The website promotes a token that has already been launched, and on-chain activity shows strong indicators of fraudulent behavior, including extreme supply concentration, early large sell-offs, and visible investor losses shortly after launch.
This domain is not affiliated with the official project in any way. It is creating confusion among users, causing reputational damage to the brand, and exposing the public to potential financial harm.

The following sites have been reported by users as potentially fraudulent. These links are provided for reference and investigative purposes only, not as endorsements.

www.bearmarketcoin.vip
